snippet: Spain's Tabernas Desert was the backdrop to countless spaghetti westerns that have become cultural touchstones. More than 40 years ago, three film studios kept the area abuzz. Alvaro Deprit returned to explore the region and found the good, the bad -...
abstract: Spain's Tabernas Desert was the backdrop to countless spaghetti westerns that have become cultural touchstones. More than 40 years ago, three film studios kept the area abuzz. Alvaro Deprit returned to explore the region and found the good, the bad - and the lonely.

headline.main: Once Upon a Time in Tabernas
